nodes.text: The Hajara gang was a gang that operated prior to the Bordal Contagion of 214 BBY. The gang raided transports on the planet Corva Yag, forcing the head of Kett Shipping, Findal Kett, to stop running convoys across the Little Minos Run. Some time after the Bordal Contagion, the Hajara gang, as well as the Fujari pirates, were destroyed within a week of each other.
